text:
Hi
can we do SEO optimization for dynamic page ?
Hey <@U05LW2RC94Z>, depends on what you want to optimize. In general you should be able to provide quite a lot of information for SEO context

i will be creating bunch of dynamic pages so i was thinkin about page meta description and other aspects for SEO becz i have seen url and title for page but never used meta description for page i dont know how to add meta descriptions on table

You have to enable the "enable the creation of dynamic pages" in the HubDB settings (TABLE -> Actions -> Manage settings). Doing so will let you select the columns for meta desc. (You have to create them)
thanks <@UJAPS2K4N>  it will work perfectly thanks alot
